title: looking for a group of people to make a rank 5 team
body:
i am looking for plat to diamond players i may be gold 5 but thats because im stuck in elo hell. i play with plats to challengers all the time i can play at that level. so yer i wanna make a rank 5 teams using curse voice chat program. i am aiming for diamond at the end of season 7  add me on league of legends to chat 
(bloodedkiller5)
p.s i play any role but best would be mid lane

replies.body: "i play with plats to challengers all the time i can play at that level"
